name: b49fcc49-5de8-50f7-9f28-e87ed414b92f
notes: MBSP is a set of linguistic tools based on the TiMBL and MBT memory based learning applications developed at CNTS and ILK. It provides tools for Part of Speech tagging, Chunking, Lemmatizing, Relation Finding, Named Entity Recognition, and (for medical language) Semantic tagging.
title: Memory-Based Shallow Parser (MBSP)
